ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Flame and Frost
ygData.msgSnippet: maybe just me being facetious... hmm...all songs check magic resist... maybe these ALSO check against fire/cold? seems to me that verant would do something
ygData.messageBody:
maybe just me being facetious...

hmm...all songs check magic resist...
maybe these ALSO check against fire/cold?

seems to me that verant would do something like that...
after all, what would a bard song be without double and triple resist
checks?

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
23rd Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

p.s. no, i'm not of a level where I can see what these do


----- Original Message -----
From: "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
To: "EQBards" <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 8:30 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Chant of Flame and Frost


> Do these two songs check against the mob's fire/cold resist rates or the
> mob's magic resist rate? IIRC, someone posted a while back that every
bard
> song that affects a mob checks against the mob's magic resist rate. But
to
> me it would seem to make more sense that these two songs are exceptions
and
> use the mob's fire/cold resist rate. Can somebody confirm what the
correct
> answer is?
>

<snip>
